task: Answer the questions about the following passage
context: My name's Taylor Lance. I was an astronaut on board the starship Varia. I am a student who won a lottery to join this mission.

output: My name's Taylor Lance. I was an astronaut on board the starship Varia.
I'm a student, I was never, ever meant to be without a trained supervisor by my side at any time.
So it's safe to say that this crash landing wasn't covered anywhere in my student handbook.
Yes, my number came up in a lottery of science students, and I got to join this mission.
I did, back on Earth... but I'd rather not talk about it.
I technically don't work for anyone, I'm a student who just won a lottery and got to join this mission.
